website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need a daily eyeliner or one that can easily be smudged to create evening looks, Clinique's Quickliner eyeliner pencil delivers.
pros: Creamy and easy to apply, making it ideal for everyday use
Has a smudger tip for creating soft, smoky liner for more dramatic looks
Simply twist it up for fresh product
Not waterproof but stays in place well
cons: May fade or smudge throughout the day, requiring touch-ups
Rare complaints of automatic pencil breaking

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured or described
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner I received was not as pictured or described...there is no smudge tip. It was a thin (really thin!) “superfine liner for brows.” I am disappointed in the item. It was not the item I ordered or have purchased previously from local retailers. This was too fine and, additionally, the tip is dry causing it to break. I ordered and paid for a higher quality liner. I will not order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect shade for my (senior) blue/gray eyes and fair complexion. Goes on smoothly without tugging and the blender comes in handy for shading.
customer_reviews.author: LWR

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: When I attempt to wind more liner out of the tube it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Veenstra

customer_reviews.title: Best to check item in store
customer_reviews.text: This item both colors that I ordered. Faulty, super unhappy also the moss colored item same problem took in to ups to return over 100.00 to send back 13.00 item, no thank you. Should have just excepted the hassle of going to mall would have had product in hand and spent 2 hours of my time.
customer_reviews.author: M.k.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: While this eyeliner stays put all day you can correct mistakes you made when first applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina T

customer_reviews.title: color and way to be able to apply
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, was able to buy in Mankato. I just really like the way it works and control I have of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F.

customer_reviews.title: Great change from my usual black!
customer_reviews.text: love it! I like this slate color when traditional black feels too dark.
customer_reviews.author: BBMom

customer_reviews.title: Received item not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The liner I received is NOT what is shown on Amazon. The color is accurate but the liner pencil is thin with no smudge tip. Disappointing at best.
customer_reviews.author: Jill F. Doane

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner lasts for an extended period of time on the eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Product all dried out and unable to use at all
customer_reviews.text: These items were all dried out and I was unable to use any of them. Will order directly from Lancôme from now on.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this eyeliner, I have gotten many compliments when I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lori M Burress

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye liner! Good color. Easy to apply. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: The only eyeliner that lasts all day. This color is not too harsh
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! I really like this eyeliner. Product exactly as described. I will buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lee

customer_reviews.title: I really like the contrast and it lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: This is my "go to" everyday eyeliner even though I have brown eyes, I really like the contrast and it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Katzman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slate is great! How about having some others in the offering?
customer_reviews.author: By the Sea

customer_reviews.title: Good pick.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this liner for years. I still prefer it over others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja

customer_reviews.title: I don’t get it.
customer_reviews.text: I love a lot of Clinique products but not their eyeliners. I really do not see how anyone likes them. No color comes out. I have to go over and over my eyes. You can barely see anything. And they don’t last. It looks like it’s this huge pencil that will last forever when in reality there is barely any extra to twist up after using the initial dab you see when you open the product. I really don’t get what people see in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie from Naples

customer_reviews.title: anyone having trouble getting the eyeliner to advance when you turn the barrel or whatever it is called
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 2 of these online from nordstrom and has anyone else had trouble getting the crayon to roll out. i have tried everything and both of them won't advance the product further. i threw away receipts but thought i would write a review on here to get some feedback
customer_reviews.author: D. THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of this stuff - been using it exclusively for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Mostly for my eye liner and brows. It is not so harsh as black. Very easy to use. B Mac
customer_reviews.author: Terry MacPherson

product_meta.title: Quickliner For Eyes - 04 Slate by Clinique for Women Eye Liner
product_meta.description: CLINIQUE Quickliner For Eyes SHADE: 04 Slate "Automatic eyeliner pencil twists up. Glides on. Smudges to a smooth blur of colour with the convenient smudge tool on the opposite end. Needs no sharpening-silky formula is always ready to line and define with ease. Stays on all day. Ophthalmologist tested." "Quick Tip: Don't overdo--it just takes 3-4 turns for a fresh dose of colour." "Skin Types: All" HOW TO USE: - "Swivel up only 1/8-inch (pencil does not retract to avoid exposing formula to air, which is drying)." - "Line eyes." - "Use the smudging tool on the opposite end to gently smudge colour to desired effect." - "Allow colour to set for 60 seconds to ensure transfer-resistance." - "Recap securely after using to protect the silky formula." - "Can be used alone or over eye shadow. Remove with your favourite Clinique eye makeup remover." !NEW & UNBOXED! 100% Authentic!
feature_bullets: CLINIQUE Quickliner For Eyes SHADE: 04 Slate
